recordTypes.name: Vehicle Accident Report
recordTypes.description: Pursuant to the Metro Code of Laws, all accidents involving a vehicle registered by the Transportation Licensing commission which is involved in an accident with injuries or death as well as any accident with more than $400 in damages must be reported within 72 hours. If an injury occurs, then a drug screen must be taken within 24 hours of the accident with the report faxed to the Commission office.

recordTypes.name: Taxi Company Decal/Quarterly Reviews
recordTypes.description: Quarterly Reviews and fees are due by January 1st, April 1st, July 1st, and October 1st.

recordTypes.name: Residential Parking Permit (RPP) - Resident
recordTypes.description: This is the application for Resident parking permits only, search for "Residential Parking Permit (RPP) - Visitor" for the visitor parking application.

recordTypes.name: Residential Parking Permit (RPP) -  Visitor
recordTypes.description: This is the application for Residential Parking Permit holders to apply for visitor permits.  Maximum issued is 2 per address.

recordTypes.name: Company Owner/Partner Background Check
recordTypes.description: Applicants must have a TN Driverâ€™s License

recordTypes.name: Downtown Residential Parking Permit (DTRPP)
recordTypes.description: Request NEW or RENEW DTRPP (Downtown Residential Parking Permit) for a DTRPP Permit Parking Only Street.  Permits expire yearly on December 31st and must be renewed.

recordTypes.name: Taxi Company Application
recordTypes.description: Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity

recordTypes.name: Request for Additional Taxicab Permits
recordTypes.description: Use this form to request additional taxi cab permits

recordTypes.name: Non-Consent Towing Application
recordTypes.description: General Wrecker Service and to Perform Non-Consent Towing
